member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL
member.summary: Options for setting the IQ rejection parameter for the Radar Detection class

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.FIXED_NOISE_REJECTION
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter is fixed at noiseRejection.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.SCALING_NOISE_REJECTION_ADD
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter will be the sum of the background noise plus the parameter noiseRejection.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.SCALING_NOISE_REJECTION_MULTIPLY
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter will be the product of the background noise times the parameter noiseRejection.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.SCALING_NOISE_REJECTION_TARGET
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter will adjusted until we reach the specified background noise of the noiseRejection parameter.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.SCALING_NOISE_REJECTION_RAW_RADAR
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter will adjusted based on the median of the raw radar values.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL.SCALING_NOISE_REJECTION_RAW_RADAR_SCALING
member.summary: The noise rejection parameter will scale depending upon how high the median of the raw radar values are. Higher medians are suppressed more.

member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST
member.summary: Options for requesting the IQ rejection parameter for the Radar Detection class

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST.IQ_REJECTION_ZERO
member.summary: The noise rejection value set to zero

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST.IQ_REJECTION_MAX
member.summary: The noise rejection value set to max

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST.IQ_REJECTION_CURRENTLY_USED
member.summary: The noise rejection value currently used by the system

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST.RADAR_Q
member.summary: The current radar Q noise.

member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION
member.summary: Options for how much of the sample window is used in determining a request for information.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION.SAMPLE_WINDOW_FULL
member.summary: The entire ADC sample window is used.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION.SAMPLE_WINDOW_FIRST_HALF
member.summary: The first half of the ADC sample window is used.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION.SAMPLE_WINDOW_SECOND_HALF
member.summary: The second half of the ADC sample window is used.

member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection
member.summary: Radar Detection class

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the RadarDetection software
member.returns: The result of radar detection initialization: Success, Fail

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.Uninitialize
member.summary: Uninitializes the RadarDetection software
member.returns: The result of radar detection initialization: Success, Fail

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.DetectionCalculation(System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Radar data is given to the unwrap algorithm which looks for displacements above the threshold.
member.returns: Returns true if a detection was found, false if no detection was found.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.DetectionCalculation(System.UInt16[],System.UInt16[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Radar data is given to the unwrap algorithm which looks for displacements above the threshold.
member.returns: Returns true if a detection was found, false if no detection was found.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.SetDetectionParameters(Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_CONTROL,System.Double,System.Double,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Sets detection parameters.
member.param: The type of algorithm used to control background noise.
The threshold used to determine if there is a detection. Lower thresholds increase sensitivity but might cause false alarms.
The parameter used in the algorithm controling background noise. 1 is default. Higher suppresses noise more but hurts sensitivity.
The number of M windows used in the M out of N detection.
The number of windows used in the M out of N detection.
A value that outputs raw radar data in different formats to the serial port.
A small target filter that suppresses windows where no radar data exceeds this value. The higher the value the greater the suppression. Generally only this or classifierTargetFilter is used.
A small target filter that partially suppresses windows where no radar data exceeds this value. The higher the value the greater the suppression. Generally only this or targetSizeFilter is used.
member.returns: Returns true if parameters are set, false if there was a problem.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetBackgroundNoiseLevel(Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST)
member.summary: Request the background noise level
member.returns: Return the current background noise level.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.ResetBackgroundNoiseTracking
member.summary: Reset background noise tracking
member.returns: Returns true if reset occured, false if there was no reset.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetIQRejectionLevel
member.summary: Request the IQ rejection currently used
member.returns: Return the current IQ rejection level.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetLastUnwrap(Samraksh.eMote.RADAR_NOISE_REQUEST)
member.summary: Request the last unwrap value

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetWindowOverThreshold
member.summary: Request whether the last window's displacement was over the threshold
member.returns: Returns true if last window's displacement was over the threshold and false if not.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.CurrentDetectionFinished
member.summary: Request whether the current detection has finished
member.returns: Returns true if the current detection is finished and false if not.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetNetDisplacement(Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION)
member.summary: Request the window's net displacement

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetAbsoluteDisplacement(Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION)
member.summary: Request the window's absolute displacement.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetDisplacementRange(Samraksh.eMote.SAMPLE_WINDOW_PORTION)
member.summary: Request the window's displacement range.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.Algorithm.RadarDetection.GetCountOverTarget
member.summary: Request the window's count of samples over classifierTargetFilter parameter.
member.returns: Returns the window's count of samples over target.

member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference
member.summary: A data reference is is a pointer to a record in DataStore. Class methods to read and write from/to DataStore, to delete a data reference, and to get meta data about the reference.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.dataType
member.summary: DataType of reference

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.#ctor(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore,System.Int32,Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.ReferenceDataType)
member.summary: Default data class constructor. Possible to create max of 256 active data objects.
member.param: DataStore object
Size of the data object to be stored in DataStore. Max size is (2^32 - 1) if type is bytes; (2^31 - 1) if type is uint16; (2^30 - 1) if type is uint32
Type of data to be stored in DataStore
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument
Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.summary: Returns a data object corresponding to the input parameter data ID. Possible to create max of 256 active data objects.
member.param: DataStore object
ID of data for which user wants a reference/handle
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument
Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.summary: The block storage device type

member.summary: The only instance of DataStore.

member.summary: For synchronization between multiple threads

member.summary: HashTable for storing multiple instances of DataStore initialized to different block storage devices

member.summary: Private constructor so that only one instance of DataStore exists.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.Instance(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.StorageType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Multiton pattern. This allows DataStore to be initialized with different block storage devices such as NOR, NAND etc. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiton_pattern

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.InitDataStore(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.StorageType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes DataStore with specified storage type.
member.param: Storage type
Should datastore be erased?

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.ReadAllDataReferences(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills an array with data references from specified offset.
member.param: Data reference array
Offset from first data reference in DataStore
member.remarks: Typically an offset variable. passed as the second argument, is initialized to zero and incremented by the size of the data reference array after each invocation of the method. This will iteratively return all data references. If, after invocation, the array is null then no more data references.
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.DeleteAllData
member.summary: Deletes all data references from DataStore. Does not actually erase the data, but marks them as inactive.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.GC
member.summary: Performs garbage collection on DataStore. This is done internally by DataStore when there is not enough space to add new data. GC rearranges data internally so that all active data are grouped together. Then the inactive data are erased one block at a time.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.EraseAllData
member.summary: Deletes all data references from DataStore and erases them.
